2ee48f4b-1cad-4485-9447-70289a85ed00.name: Constriction Attack
2ee48f4b-1cad-4485-9447-70289a85ed00.notes: If you succeed on a grapple against an opponent no larger than your own SM, on your next turn, and each successive turn, roll a Quick Contest of your ST vs. your victimâ€™s ST or HT, whichever is higher. If you win, your victim takes damage equal to your margin of victory; otherwise, no damage is inflicted

660a0b12-e4ac-4c91-bcdc-7a5401186cbb.name: Oxygen Storage
660a0b12-e4ac-4c91-bcdc-7a5401186cbb.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

d9a33929-391d-41f6-9894-1197ee96edb5.name: Oxygen Storage
d9a33929-391d-41f6-9894-1197ee96edb5.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

a4ed1c01-04a8-4b1f-9339-89dd051825ec.name: Oxygen Storage
a4ed1c01-04a8-4b1f-9339-89dd051825ec.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

bfa171fe-63e9-4437-aa82-195b49a7b89e.name: Oxygen Storage
bfa171fe-63e9-4437-aa82-195b49a7b89e.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

64917296-c798-4254-8b2c-33017c52962d.name: Oxygen Storage
64917296-c798-4254-8b2c-33017c52962d.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

12193c22-9303-443d-8825-dee61dde2bd6.name: Diffuse
12193c22-9303-443d-8825-dee61dde2bd6.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

048c0099-3f27-442e-b015-3ed16a4e95ca.name: Homogenous
048c0099-3f27-442e-b015-3ed16a4e95ca.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

ce94ba8e-a289-494e-9f5d-0eb45863fa5d.name: No Blood
ce94ba8e-a289-494e-9f5d-0eb45863fa5d.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

0c49b8a4-509c-4acb-825a-3ba8a3e1bbf0.name: No Brain
0c49b8a4-509c-4acb-825a-3ba8a3e1bbf0.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

0a1c2ab8-fc8f-493b-a5dd-c3ab9ba34f2e.name: No Eyes
0a1c2ab8-fc8f-493b-a5dd-c3ab9ba34f2e.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

bc3bd56c-6f36-4ed4-a634-58351f0459cd.name: No Head
bc3bd56c-6f36-4ed4-a634-58351f0459cd.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

125b7178-30b6-4722-baef-ef5005e9b8b9.name: No Neck
125b7178-30b6-4722-baef-ef5005e9b8b9.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

52bf622f-9a73-4301-b0f3-4968243e9d09.name: No Vitals
52bf622f-9a73-4301-b0f3-4968243e9d09.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

a342da9f-5f16-49ed-accc-2aa6fbd9ea46.name: Unliving
a342da9f-5f16-49ed-accc-2aa6fbd9ea46.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

06c4d72a-44f0-489e-9c38-667b5542aabc.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

171e97fd-f831-4461-8bdf-44a209aa409c.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

7bfbab3b-c144-464c-8617-53a48287ce9b.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
